captions.text: This year I’ve been away from my family because I had to go abroad. It was quite hard.
But it was with very good people. They were older than me, and they made me change.
they made me become like them: grow up.
If I play well tomorrow, it will be great for my family.
I think for the last 3 or 4 months, it’s been really difficult for Lorenzo, in terms of trying to adapt himself
and having to grow up in a short amount of time compared to some of his teammates.
However, I think that the benefits will be there.
Ever since I was a child, I’ve dreamt of meeting Totti. Today, my dream came true and I’m really happy about that.
Although football is about passion, enjoyment, you have to approach it as a job.
Unfortunately at your age, that means making sacrifices. Your youth has to take second place,
along with other things, although you will have time to catch up on them later on.
Part of what makes a difference in football is concentration, the will not to be outdone, especially for defenders.
When a defender makes a mistake you can see it straight away just like goalkeepers.
And then there’s the desire to improve, match after match and most of all to recognise your mistakes,
which is something that many defenders don’t do much these days.
It's fundamental, especially as a centre back, because you can see what happens up front;
you have a different view of things, different from that of midfielders or strikers.
I played with Roma for three years, and so they’re my ex-teammates. Today, I’m back in Trigoria,
the pitch where I used to train, and it’s a great feeling. I think playing against them will be even better.
Okay, let’s sit down. If you pass the ball quickly, and we move the ball around,
I don’t care what team we play, they will find it difficult against us. If you go in thinking
we must win and do what we want to do, we won’t win the game of football.
You’ve shown us all that you can pass the ball, you can work hard, you’re a collective group.
You’re good enough to win this game. Off you go!
Go Lorenzo!
Keep it, keep it!
The work there, was terrific. And that’s what you have to do against these sides.
PSG, Roma, Barcelona, Arsenal, Celtic, whoever you play. That’s what you have to do.
Forget the score, you want their shirt. You want their contract, and that’s what it's about, their contract.
It's about nothing else for you other than that
To come to a massive club like AS Roma, its been a really good experience for the boys and obviously
to come away with the result, 4:0 is fantastic.
We are trying to get into a professional team.
The Academy puts us through all the things that a professional team does.
They help us a lot. If we play for a professional side one day, we’ll know what is coming.

title: Nike Academy: AS Roma: Coming Home
